column2: "Okay, now that I have your report, your request to lift the cap can proceed. We look forward to bigger and better things from you."
"At least, that's what the ARKS Code Reporting Section says I should say. Now, I'm going to go off the record here."
"I've seen operatives like you come and go through here countless times. Some I never see again."
"Just remember, there are plenty of ARKS members, but there is only one you, so don't push yourself too hard."
"You can now select Featured Quests and Bonus Quests."
